title: Jalen Hurts vs Tom Brady, Fixing the Texans, Hall of Famer Isaac Bruce, Super Wild Card Weekend Picks and Brightest Stars!
itunes:title: Jalen Hurts vs Tom Brady, Fixing the Texans, Hall of Famer Isaac Bruce, Super Wild Card Weekend Picks and Brightest Stars!
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Shaun O'Hara discuss the Eagles chances against the Buccaneers and how it's an opportunity for Jalen Hurts to start his playoff legacy. The Texans fired David Culley but finding a new head coach isn't the only step needed to fix this franchise, Looking at the NFC, Kyle explains why he's taking the Eagles and Peter, Shaun, and Kay are all taking the 49ers over the Cowboys. Hall of Famer Isaac Bruce stops by to discuss the pressure on the Rams this postseason and the play of Cooper Kupp. We close the week with our Super Wild Card Weekend picks and the players that will be the Brightest Stars in these games.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
